title: Predictive Maintenance using Amazon Lookout for Equipment and SNS
description: Create a pipeline for ingesting sensor data, ML anamoly detection and sns notification

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to build a predictive maintenance pipeline using Amazon Lookout for equipment.
Your sensor data will be ingested using IoT and Kinesis in real time and stored in an s3 bucket where Amazon Lookout for equipment
will use ML anomaly detection to predict equipment failure. You will be notified using SNS
See the Github repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Godswill Iroh
authors.bio: Godswill was an Intern at AWS for Energy
